ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Enrolment in a relevant professional register
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator is enrolled in relevant professional registers kept in the Member State of its establishment as described in Annex XI of Directive 2014/24/EU; economic operators from certain Member States may have to comply with other requirements set out in that Annex.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: Directive 2014/24/EU

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Enrolment in a trade register
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator is enrolled in trade registers kept in the Member State of its establishment as described in Annex XI of Directive 2014/24/EU; economic operators from certain Member States may have to comply with other requirements set out in that Annex.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: Directive 2014/24/EU

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For service contracts: authorisation of particular organisation needed
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Is a particular membership of a particular organisation needed in order to be able to perform the service in question in the country of establishment of the economic operator?

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: Directive 2014/24/EU

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For service contracts: membership of particular organisation needed
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Is a particular membership of a particular organisation needed in order to be able to perform the service in question in the country of establishment of the economic operator?

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: Directive 2014/24/EU

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: General yearly turnover
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator's general yearly turnover for the number of financial years required in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD is as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Average yearly turnover
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator's average yearly turnover for the number of years required in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD is as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Specific yearly turnover
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator's specific yearly turnover in the business area covered by the contract for the number of financial years required in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD is as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Specific average turnover
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator's specific average yearly turnover in the business area covered by the contract for the number of years required in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD is as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Financial ratio
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Concerning the financial ratios specified in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD, the economic operator declares that the actual values for the required ratios are as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Requirement.cbc:Description: Please provide the the required ratio - ratio between x and y - and the value

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Professional risk indemnity insurance
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The insured amount in its professional risk indemnity insurance is the following.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Other economic or financial requirements
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Concerning the other economic or financial requirements, if any, that may have been specified in the relevant notice or the procurement documents, please specify which apply to this economic operator.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For works contracts: performance of works of the specified type
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: During the reference period, the economic operator has performed the following works of the specified type. Contracting authorities may require up to five years and allow experience dating from more than five years.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: performance of deliveries of the specified type
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: During the reference period, the economic operator has delivered the following principal deliveries of the type specified. Contracting authorities may require up to three years and allow experience dating from more than three years.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For service contracts: performance of services of the specified type
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: During the reference period, the economic operator has provided the following main services of the type specified. Contracting authorities may require up to three years and allow experience dating from more than three years.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Technicians or technical bodies for quality control
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator can call upon the following technicians or technical bodies , especially those responsible for quality control. For technicians or technical bodies not belonging directly to the economic operator's undertaking but on whose capacities the economic operator relies as set out under Part II, Section C, separate ESPD forms must be filled in.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For works contracts: technicians or technical bodies to carry out the work
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: In the case of public works contracts, the economic operator will be able to call on the following technicians or technical bodies to carry out the work.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Technical facilities and measures for ensuring quality
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator uses the following technical facilities and measures for ensuring quality are as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Study and research facilities
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator uses the following study and research facilities are as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Supply chain management
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator will be able to apply the following supply chain management and tracking systems when performing the contract.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Allowance of checks
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: For complex products or services to be supplied or, exceptionally, for products or services which are required for a special purpose: The economic operator will allow checks to be conducted on the production capacities or the technical capacity of the economic operator and, where necessary, on the means of study and research which are available to it and on the quality control measures? The check is to be performed by the contracting authority or, in case the latter consents to this, on its behalf by a competent official body of the country in which the supplier or service provider is established.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Educational and professional qualifications
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The following educational and professional qualifications are held by the service provider or the contractor itself, and/or (depending on the requirements set out in the relevant notice or the procurement documents by its managerial staff.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Environmental management measures
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator will be able to apply the following environmental management measures when performing the contract.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Number of managerial staff
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operators number of managerial staff for the last three years were as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Average annual manpower
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operators average annual manpower for the last three years were as follows.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Tools, plant or technical equipment
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The following tools, plant or technical equipment will be available to it for performing the contract.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Subcontracting proportion
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator intends possibly to subcontract the following proportion (i.e. percentage) of the contract. Please note that if the economic operator has decided to subcontract a part of the contract and relies on the subcontractors capacities to perform that part, then please fill in a separate ESPD for such subcontractors, see Part II, Section C above.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: samples, descriptions or photographs without certification of authenticity
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator will supply the required samples, descriptions or photographs of the products to be supplied, which do not need to be accompanied by certifications of authenticity.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: samples, descriptions or photographs with certification of authenticity
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator will supply the required samples, descriptions or photographs of the products to be supplied and will provide certifications of authenticity where applicable.

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: certificates by quality control institutes
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Can the economic operator provide the required certificates drawn up by official quality control institutes or agencies of recognised competence attesting the conformity of products clearly identified by references to the technical specifications or standards, which are set out in the relevant notice or the procurement documents?

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Certificates by independent bodies about quality assurance standards
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Will the economic operator be able to produce certificates drawn up by independent bodies attesting that the economic operator complies with the required quality assurance standards, including accessibility for disabled persons?

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

ccv:Criterion.cbc:Name: Certificates by independent bodies about environmental management systems or standards
ccv:Criterion.cbc:Description: Will the economic operator be able to produce certificates drawn up by independent bodies attesting that the economic operator complies with the required environmental management systems or standards?

ccv:LegislationReference.ccv-cbc:Title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
ccv:LegislationReference.cbc:Description: On public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC
